entity.query: INSERT INTO ST_ARP_OUTBOUND (ARP_WORKFLOW_ID, ACCOUNT_TYPE, ITEM_MASTER_SID, RS_MODEL_SID, USER_ID, SESSION_ID, ETL_CHECK_RECORD) SELECT DISTINCT ARP_WORKFLOW_ID, ACCOUNT_TYPE, ITEM_MASTER_SID, RS_MODEL_SID, [?USER_ID], [?SESSION_ID], 1 FROM ARP_OUTBOUND WHERE OUTBOUND_STATUS = 0;
SELECT TOP 1(STATUS) FROM AUDIT_MASTER_INBOUND WHERE APPLICATION_PROCESS ='?' ORDER BY MODIFIED_DATE DESC
SELECT VALIDATION FROM WORKFLOW_PROFILE WHERE PROCESS_NAME ='@PROCESS'
